Watch in the Wild

September 2014
CS160 User Interface Design

A low-fi prototype for a team roster/attendance watch application. Demonstrates once cycle of iterative process, from interviewing to brainstorming to prototyping to testing. It’s very near and dear to me, because any chance to do some crafting instead of just making digital mockups is great!

See the Hackster.io post for the full design process.

Updated June 16, 2016
